channel.title: Creating a website on So long as you get the GIST of it
channel.description: Recent content in Creating a website on So long as you get the GIST of it

item.title: Old website tutorial
item.description: Like apparently everything digital these days, not even a year later and most of the material I’ve written here is too out of date to be used as a direct tutorial (like nailing a flying carpet down, the reproducibility crisis might really be a thing). The academic theme has now moved to a quasi-GUI driven deployment system which both makes the site easier to create and deploy, but also strips it of the flexibility to modify it as I’ve outlined here.
